action_description: This action will execute a scene to control multiple appliances at once.

This action will control TV though the preset buttons.
Note: Please use the Control home appliances actions for the button registered by learning mode.
This action will send an infrared signal to control your home appliances.

This action will control light though the preset buttons.
Note: Please use the Control home appliances actions for the button registered by learning mode.

This action will turn off your air conditioner.

Note: Please use the Control home appliances actions for the button registered by learning mode.

This action will turn on your air conditioner and set target temperature, AC operation mode and air volume settings.

Note: Please use the Control Home Appliances actions for the button registered by learning mode.
